includedAssets.title: Top Gear: Apocalypse
includedAssets.synopsis: Just what will motoring be like in a post-apocalyptic world that's been blown to bits by nuclear bombs or a massive comet? It's a burning question that's on nobody's mind, and we give you all the answers in this incredibly cheerful Top Gear Special. Embarking on a terrifying journey into the future, we show you how to drive to work in the perpetual darkness of a Nuclear Winter, how to make motorsport exciting when there are only two racing drivers left alive, and, in a world where all cars are bristling with weapons, how to survive the savage, explosive fury of a Doomsday MOT test.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The Top Gear presenters explore what motoring would be like in a post-apocalyptic world.

includedIn.title: Top Gear
includedIn.synopsis: The world's biggest petrol-heads discuss the major news in the world of motoring and take on daring four-wheel challenges.
